edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess
Class SimpleDataDiscretizer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess.DataDiscretizer
        |
        +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess.SimpleDataDiscretizer
public class SimpleDataDiscretizer
extends DataDiscretizer

Segments numeric data into several labels. Using minimum, maximum, average and standard deviation, the data will be separated into the following five or less categories.

lower : [min] ~ [average - ( 2 * standard deviation )]
low : [average - (2*standard deviation)] ~ [average - standard deviation]
middle : [average - standard deviation] ~ [average + standard deviation]
high : [average + standard deviation] ~ [average + (2*standard deviation)]
higher : [average + (2*standard deviation)] ~ [max]

The labels and seperators will be stored, and used later when the Preprocessor transform the type of attributes from continuous to categorical.

To add more sophisticated categorization, another discretizer can be implemented by extending DataDiscretizer class.
